long_description: Plan your trip of a lifetime by choosing from 1,000 different ideas in Lonely Planet Guides. Author: contributors from Lonely Planet. Softcover; 348 pages; color photographs. Lonely Planet Publications Pty Ltd; copyright 2013. Enjoy panoramic view of Cape Town after scrambling to the top of Table Mountain, pedal your way across Vietnam from the rice paddies of the Mekong Delta to the highlands. Take in sublime vistas on a circuit of Mont Blanc, rumble across the dunes on a camel safari in Rajasthan and swim between continents in the Bosphorus swim in Istanbul. Divided by suggested activity.
short_description: Plan your trip of a lifetime by choosing from 1,000 different ideas in Lonely Planet Guides 1000 Ultimate Adventures .
